EmailTemplate.name: TS-2017-10-11-Cloud Expo Asia.EMAIL- Booth Promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic at Cloud Expo Asia | Stand L80
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See Turbonomic at Cloud Expo Asia Turbonomic is pleased to advise that it will be demonstrating the latest release of its award winning software at
Cloud Expo Asia and Data Centre World 2017 Marina Bay Sands Convention Centre 10th & 11th of October
Please drop by and visit us at Stand L80
Turbonomic is the only Hybrid Cloud Management Platform that continuously analyzes application consumption, costs and compliance constraints and automatically allocates resources in real-time. It assures application performance by giving workloads the resources they need when they need them. Turbonomic Asia Pacific HQ 567 Collins Street, Level 21 Melbourne VIC 3000 Australia
